[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Banner2-1.jpg” height=”600px” height_tablet=”50vh” height_phone=”35vh” height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”30px||15px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Company Overview

Indo Farm Equipment Limited is a distinguished ISO-certified crane and tractor manufacturing company situated in Baddi, Himachal Pradesh. The commencement of its manufacturing operations dates back to the year 2000, initiated through a technical collaboration with Ursus (Poland). Now, Indo Farm is a leading manufacturer of world-class Agriculture Tractors, Cranes, and various other agricultural Implements. 

The company’s state-of-the-art manufacturing facility spans across an impressive 34 acres, dedicated to crafting farming tractor models ranging from 20 HP to 110 HP, featuring numerous variants to cater to diverse needs. With an installed capacity of 18,000 tractors, 2,400 cranes, and 20,000 engines per annum, Indo Farm is committed to delivering excellence.

The company’s advanced foundry, equipped with induction furnaces, not only ensures superior quality but also guarantees uninterrupted supplies and make India powerful tractors and cranes. In a strategic move in 2008, Indo Farm diversified its portfolio to include the manufacturing and marketing of Pick-N-Carry cranes with capacities ranging from 9 tons to 30 tons. This expansion showcases Indo Farm’s commitment to innovation and meeting the evolving needs of the market.

A message from the Chairman

Indo Farm Equipment Private Limited is a dream come true. The objective of starting the company was very simple – to get the tractor to the farmer. And how? By manufacturing farming tractors with outstanding performance at affordable prices. After a lot of research and analysis, we built a product that became the light bearer for us, all thanks to our team of experts. It is purely through their hard work and conviction that we are able to achieve our goals. 

Once we saw the impact of our tractors in the agricultural sector, we wanted to do more. So we diversified our expertise in working towards creating Hydraulic Pick-n-Carry cranes to revolutionize the industrial, construction and mining sectors. Engines have always been our pride and we make them for generator sets to meet the global need for electricity that is ever-increasing. 

We also have our own subsidiary, NBFC, Barota Finance, to make financing easy, hassle-free and quick for our esteemed customers. 

We are confident that with the continued support and goodwill of our partners and business associates, we will deliver our best and grow exponentially in the years to come. 

R.S. Khadwalia 

Chairman & Managing Director[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||25px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#EEF9F0″ custom_padding=”30px|30px|30px|30px|true|true” border_radii=”on|10px|10px|10px|10px” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ admin_label=”mission” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Mission

To offer high quality multi featured fuel-efficient agricultural, industrial and construction equipment at optimum cost and deliver world-class performance, backed by excellent after-sales service.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ admin_label=”values” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Vision

To be the most reliable, trustworthy and socially responsible agricultural and construction equipment manufacturer in the world.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”indoFarmStory” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”2rem” header_3_line_height=”3rem” header_3_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_3_font_size_phone=”1.7rem” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Indo Farm Story

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”20px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”98ec649d-8194-4072-902f-8123460d0431″ text_orientation=”justified” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|15|15|25|4|0|0″ text_orientation_tablet=”justified” text_orientation_phone=”justified” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Incorporated in 1994, Indo Farm Equipment Limited is an ISO Certified Company located in the foothills of the beautiful State of Himachal Pradesh in India. We proudly manufacture world-class tractors, cranes, engines, diesel gensets and Harvester Combines. Indo Farm commenced commercial production of tractors in October 2000 and in 2008, the company diversified into manufacturing and marketing of Pick-N-Carry cranes of 9 tonnes – 30 tonnes capacity and commenced production of mobile tower cranes. Spread over 34 acres, the plant started with the production of a single tractor model. Within a year of our operations, we successfully indigenized the engine components, manufacturing and assembly processes and stopped import of engines. Engines being the company’s core competence area, we are now making engines for generator sets that are exported. The company has its state-of-the-art foundry equipped with induction furnaces in order to ensure better quality as well as to ensure uninterrupted supply. Indo Farm operates pan-India and is a well recognized brand, associated with quality and dependability. The company operates through 6 regional offices and a 173 strong dealer network for sales and service.

Just like our products, we believe in power – the power of dreams, the strength of human determination and the vigour of honest sweat. We created a company that not only helps farmers fulfil their dreams, but also gives them new dreams.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”30px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”3px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#000000″ global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Advantages

[/et_pb_text][dsm_icon_list icon_color=”#21B354″ list_vertical_alignment=”flex-start” list_space_between=”15px” list_padding=”15px|15px|15px|15px|true|true” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Montserrat||||||||” custom_margin=”-23px|||||” border_width_all_list_item=”1px” border_color_all_list_item=”#21B354″ global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_icon_list_child text=”Installed Capacity of 12 ,000 tractors and 1,280 Cranes per annum.” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#18bd55″ icon_font_size=”25px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”State-of-the-art Machine Shop with more than 150 modern machines, SPMs and latest CNC machining centres for producing excellent quality components like Cylinder heads, Blocks, Transmission housings, Gear boxes, Hydraulic housings, Axle tubes, Differential Cages, Timing cases & covers, Flywheel housings, etc.” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#18BD55″ icon_font_size=”25px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”Separate Research, Design, Development and Testing Department, instrumental in developing tractors using latest technology for catering to the ever-changing farming needs.” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”#18BD55″ icon_font_size=”25px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”Own Foundry unit commissioned in 2006. Ensures better product quality.” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ icon_font_size=”25px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22icon_color%22%93}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][dsm_icon_list_child text=”Top management comprising of professionals with rich industry experience.” font_icon=”||fa||900″ icon_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ icon_font_size=”25px” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” text_font_size=”1rem” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22icon_color%22%93}”][/dsm_icon_list_child][/dsm_icon_list][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ module_id=”indoFarmStory” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-a347593f-95af-4029-a172-1f48b6a83291%22:%91%22background_color%22%93}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”||10px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”2caebda7-1c6a-4d05-9d5d-92ad76e16d75″ header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_3_font_size=”2rem” header_3_line_height=”3rem” header_3_font_size_tablet=”3rem” header_3_font_size_phone=”1.7rem” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Strength

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”20px||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”98ec649d-8194-4072-902f-8123460d0431″ text_orientation=”justified” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|15|15|25|4|0|0″ text_orientation_tablet=”justified” text_orientation_phone=”justified” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

State-of-art Machine Shop having more than 150 modern machines, CMM, SPMs and latest CNC machining centres for producing excellent quality components like Cylinder heads, Blocks, Transmission housings, Gear boxes, Hydraulic housings, Axle tubes, Differential Cages, Timing cases & covers, Fly wheel housings, etc.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″
